creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: satin panels tacked just below center in purple; vibrant embroidery with birds, animals and flowers in multi-colors; embroidery in lower 2/3 of panels; scalloped narrow blue tape on outside edges; horizontal border of embroidered Chinese characters; paper lining with finished embroidery
medium: Satin, paper pattern, gold colored metal, rayon (?) tape, cotton; needlework
title: Set of Two Embroidered Panels
